definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation

sentences.english: The window of opportunity is shrinking, and differentiation is harder to claim.
sentences.chinese: 机会之窗正在变小，差异化更难断言。

sentences.english: Lehman Brothers was a symptom of a dysfunctional financial system and regulatory failure.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟是异化的金融系统和监管失败的症状。

sentences.english: His idea ofalienation was derived mostly from Hegel.
sentences.chinese: 他的关于异化的理念绝大部分脱胎于黑格尔。

sentences.english: Improve the differentia degree of banking production.
sentences.chinese: 提高银行产品的差异化程度。

sentences.english: To increase this transition probability, the dissimilation operation is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 要增加这种转移概率，需要引进异化操作。

sentences.english: The paradox of objectification and differentiation is the historical mystery.
sentences.chinese: 对象化与异化的二律背反是历史之谜。

sentences.english: Differences also have to focus on the development of domestic industry on supervision of the industry.
sentences.chinese: 尾货行业差异化发展还要注重对这个行业的监管。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is the double guidance product variation strategy model construction and the implementation.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是双导向产品差异化战略模型的构建与实施。

sentences.english: Jean-Jacques Rousseau also noticed that private property makes man alienate.
sentences.chinese: 卢梭也看到了私有制使人产生异化。

sentences.english: Foreignizing translation goes beyond literalism and encourages experiments and innovations.
sentences.chinese: 异化超越直译，提倡翻译实验与创新。

sentences.english: Innovation and diversity is the soul of the marketing strategy of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 创新和差异化是姚翠荣酱业市场营销策略的灵魂。

sentences.english: Still, this book gives reasonable warnings about how technology could dehumanize us.
sentences.chinese: 但是这本书仍然可以警示我们技术对人的异化作用。

sentences.english: “I think we are investing more in software differentiation,” he said.
sentences.chinese: “我认为我们在软件差异化上投资更多，”他说。

sentences.english: Beauty ideals are blamed for eating disorders and body alienation.
sentences.chinese: 饮食紊乱和身体异化归咎于美的理想。

sentences.english: The root cause for the vacancy and alienation of Chinese spoken language course.
sentences.chinese: 汉语口语课程缺位与异化的深层根由。

sentences.english: While Venuti, an advocate of foreignization, advanced the concept of "resistancy" translation.
sentences.chinese: 韦努蒂是异化的代表，他提出了“反翻译”的概念。

definition: (of insects) to undergo metamorphosis/(fig.) to be transformed/to metamorphose/to become degraded
to cut apart/to sever/to separate/to isolate
